snippet: The development will leave just one facility in the Cincinnati area offering surgical abortions and none offering late-term abortions.
abstract: Lebanon Road Surgery Center, abortion clinic in Sharonville, Ohio, ends its fight with the state over revocation of its operating license, and will stop performing surgical abortions; development leaves just one facility in Cincinnati area offering surgical abortions and none offering late-term abortions.
lead_paragraph: The development will leave just one facility in the Cincinnati area offering surgical abortions and none offering late-term abortions.

headline.main: Ohio: Abortion Clinic Drops Fight Over License
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Abortion Clinic Drops Fight Over License
